sqlQuery.name: Basic
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT s.source_id AS dataset_id, '@PROJECT_ID@'::text AS project_id, s.name AS dataset_name, s.description AS full_description, t.name AS type, st.name AS subtype, c.name /* AS category */ AS data_type, jsonb_build_array('@PROJECT_ID@'::text) AS project_availability, s.approaches->>'attribution' AS attribution, s.approaches->>'display_name' AS long_display_name, s.approaches->>'short_display_name' || ' (' || (s.approaches->>'taxon_abbrev')::text || ')' AS display_name, s.approaches->>'taxon_abbrev' AS organism, s.approaches->>'display_summary' AS summary, s.approaches->>'caveat' AS caveat, CASE WHEN s.other_read = 0 THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE END AS is_public, CASE WHEN s.other_read = 0 THEN 'private' ELSE 'public' END AS study_access, jsonb_build_array(c.name) AS study_categories, jsonb_build_array(s.approaches->>'display_summary') AS card_points, CASE WHEN approaches->>'accession_ref' = 'ArrayExpress' THEN '@ARRAY_EXPRESS_URL@' ELSE 'coming soon' END AS download_url, CASE WHEN approaches->>'accession' IS NULL THEN 'TBA' ELSE approaches->>'accession' END AS accession, 1.0 AS eupath_release FROM Study.Study s, SRes.OntologyTerm t, SRes.OntologyTerm st, SRes.OntologyTerm c WHERE s.investigation_id IS NULL AND (s.approaches->>'type')::int = t.ontology_term_id AND (s.approaches->>'subtype')::int = st.ontology_term_id AND (s.approaches->>'category')::int = c.ontology_term_id

sqlQuery.name: PrimaryContact
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT i.source_id AS dataset_id, '@PROJECT_ID@'::text AS project_id, c.name AS primary_contact FROM Study.Study s, Study.Study i, Study.StudyContact sc, SRes.Contact c WHERE s.study_id = sc.study_id AND c.contact_id = sc.contact_id AND i.study_id = s.investigation_id AND s.approaches->>'attribution' = c.last

sqlQuery.name: PrimaryPublication
sqlQuery.sql: WITH b AS (SELECT r.study_id, b.* FROM SRes.BibliographicReference b, Study.StudyBibRef r WHERE r.bibliographic_reference_id = b.bibliographic_reference_id AND b.bib_ref_type_id IS NOT NULL) SELECT s.source_id AS dataset_id, b.bib_ref_type_id, split_part(b.authors, ',', 1) || ' et al. ' || b.year || '. ' || b.title || ' ' || b.publication || '. ' || volume || ':' || pages || '. PMID: ' || b.source_id || '' AS primary_publication FROM Study.Study s LEFT OUTER JOIN b ON s.study_id = b.study_id WHERE s.investigation_id IS NULL
